description:
Evilyn bragged to me on Day 1 that she was a porn star, and that she thought of herself as fierce and strong woman. Instead, what we have is a girl who is just starting out, and is unsure of her own sexual desires. I bring in the beautiful Kristina Rose to make a comparison between the two of them, and prove my point to little Evilyn that she only aspires to be what Kristina already is.
We put them both through several positions where they are bound, and I gave Evilyn every chance to prove to me that she truly wanted to be here and become a slave. Then again, maybe I just expect too much from a slave.
title: Evilyn Fierce Day 2
